dmca.title: Database Systems complains of copying
dmca.body:
User Support:

This is our formal complaint against the website owner of www.hereuare.com, whose site is currently listed in your search engine index. This site is infringing on our copyrighted website information. We request that you review this site and remove the following 2 web pages from the Google search that have been illegally copied.

(1)	Our Copyrighted material is located here:

http://www.easvivr.com http://www.databasesystemscorp.com

(2)	The offending website that contains our copyrighted material is located here: www.hereuare.com 
The specific pages we ask you to remove are the following:

http://www.hereuare.com/getArchived.php?q=&rtq=0&d=237487533810 http://www.hereuare.com/getArchived.php?q=&rtq=0&d=255004018242

The following documents the copyright infringement by the owner of the above site.

My initial check indicated 2 of our web pages have been illegally copied and appear in Google Search results.

 
EXAMPLE OF GOGGLE SEARCH
The following is an example of how this website owner has copied entire pages from our website and stored them on their site. When using the Google Search Engine and entering the search term "1998 - 2005 Database Systems Corp" which is part of our copyright statement on each site, Google returns the following results from this specific website (obtained using the Site Command).
Work From Home Telecommuting Software and Remote Agent Telework ...
Work From Home and Telecommuting Software for Remote Agent and Telework Call
Center From Database Systems Corp. Provides Work at Home Software with ... www.hereuare.com/getArchived..php?q=&rtq=0&d=237487533810 - 20k - Supplemental Result - Cached -
Similar pages

Smart Predictive Dialer Outpaces Old Predictive Dialing Technology ...
Predictive dialer systems including Predictive dialing software. ACD systems and
IVR software including CTI and CRM software.
www.hereuare.com/getArchived.php?q=&rtq=0&d=255004018242 - 25k - Supplemental Result - Cached -
Similar pages

Google returned 2 results - all are exact copies of our website at the date and time that these pages were copied from our website.


This pages were copied from the following Database Systems Corp website pages. If you click on the 2 results above, you will see these 2 web pages from our website:
http://www.databasesystemscorp.com/psracc.htm http://www.databasesystemscorp.com/pspredictive.htm

These examples demonstrate the deliberate copying of our website information and was not authorized by our company.

TRADEMARK LISTINGS

Our corporate trademarks are clearly posted on our website here with effective dates and reference numbers:

http://www.databasesystemscorp.com/trademarks.htm
 
(3)	OUR COMPANY INFORMATION
Database Systems Corp., Arizona Corporation 
[private]
Phoenix, AZ 85014
[private]
Founded: 1978
Owners: [private], [private]
Websites:
http://www.databasesystemscorp.com (Corporate) http://www.easyivr.com. (Service Division)
http://www.911broadcast.com (Emergency Broadcast Svc)

(4)	Offending Website
Owner www.hereuare.com
Registrant:	Make this info private hereUare Communications
[private]
Menlo Park, CA 94025
US

Domain Name: HEREUARE.COM
Administrative Contact , Technical Contact : hereUare Communications
hostmaster ecapital,net
[private]
Menlo Park, CA 94025
US
Phone: [private]
Fax: [private]
 
REPRESENTATIONS

I represent that I am an owner of this company and websites and am fully authorized to pursue this matter.

(5)	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

(6)	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

My contact information is the following:
[private]
President, Database Systems Corp. [private]
[private]@yahoo.com
[private]@databasesystemscorp.com


DESIRED ACTION FROM GOGGLE

Since this company is listed in the Google Search Results and is using our copyrighted material, we respectfully request that you remove these offending web pages from this website from your search engine.
Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

[private]
President
Database Systems Corp. [private]
